activities.title: Explore an Indigenous Artist
activities.subtitle: Explore works by an Indigenous artist that speak to you. How do you relate to this artist? How do they inspire you?

activities.title: Indigenous Medicinal Plants
activities.subtitle: Explore traditional plant knowledge and medicinal uses. Note teachings, sources, and how they connect to your context.

resources.label: Traditional plant foods of Indigenous Peoples in Canada (book)

activities.title: Make a Traditional Recipe
activities.subtitle: Cook a traditional Indigenous recipe. Note its origins and significance.

activities.title: Indigenous Peoples Outside Canada
activities.subtitle: Discover facts about an Indigenous population outside Canada. What stood out to you?

activities.title: Film, TV, or Podcast
activities.subtitle: Watch an Indigenous film/TV show or listen to an Indigenous-focused podcast. What did you learn?

activities.title: Read a Book
activities.subtitle: Read a book by an Indigenous author and reflect on themes, voices, and teachings.

activities.title: Learn Three Words
activities.subtitle: Learn to say a few words in an Indigenous language. Share them with your team and use them often.

activities.title: 2SLGBTQQIA+ / Two-Spirit & Indigiqueer Communities
activities.subtitle: Enrich your understanding of Two-Spirit, Indigiqueer and Indigenous 2SLGBTQQIA+ communities and their histories.

resources.label: Indigenous knowledge & Two-Spirit leadership (Native Governance Center)

activities.title: Indigenous-Focused News Story
activities.subtitle: Choose a current story from an Indigenous-led outlet. Summarize the piece and reflect on framing, voices quoted, and possible biases.

activities.title: Indigenous-Owned Business
activities.subtitle: Explore a First Nations, Inuit or Métis-owned business (in person or online). What products/services spoke to you and why?
